document_data.name: Guardian Mantle
document_data.mainbody: '''''Guardian mantle''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Dugmaren Brightmantle]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell temporarily encased the caster in a shell of transparent blue energy. This energy protected the caster from both melee and missile attacks. The spell did not protect the caster from magic-based attacks. The spell also diminished any protective magic in use by the caster, except for ''[[Mage armor|armor]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, the holy symbol of Dugmaren Brightmantle, a small piece of blue velvet and any [[gem]] with a value of at least 500 [[gp]].
